courses.name: Introduction to Software Development
courses.description: Learn the basics of software development including programming, algorithms, and data structures.

courses.name: Advanced Software Engineering
courses.description: Explore advanced concepts in software engineering, project management, and software lifecycle.

courses.name: Data Structures and Algorithms
courses.description: Understand the fundamental data structures and algorithms for efficient problem-solving.

courses.name: Database Management Systems
courses.description: Learn about database models, SQL, and how to manage and interact with databases.

courses.name: Web Development Basics
courses.description: Get started with web development including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

courses.name: Object-Oriented Programming
courses.description: Dive into the principles of object-oriented programming and design patterns.

courses.name: Software Testing and Quality Assurance
courses.description: Learn about different testing methodologies and how to ensure software quality.

courses.name: Mobile App Development
courses.description: Develop mobile applications for Android and iOS platforms.

courses.name: Cloud Computing
courses.description: Understand the basics of cloud computing and how to work with cloud services.
